DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Dapagliflozin Renal Outcomes Cardiovascular Mortality Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This international , multicentre , event-driven , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo-controlled study , evaluate effect dapagliflozin versus placebo , give daily addition standard care , prevent progression chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) cardiovascular ( CV ) /renal death
